job.title: Software Engineer I
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Financial Services,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Functions as technical leader for multiple complex applications and core utilities utilizing demonstrated ability to deliver technical solutions to the problems and challenges inherent in related projectsbrbrAs such would be involved in all phases of project life cycle assisting in the technical design coding implementation maintenance and support of assigned systemsbrbrstrong Principal Duties and Responsibilities strongstrongem Indicate key areas of responsibility major job duties special projects and key objectives for this position These items should be evaluated throughout the year and included in the written annual evaluation bremstrongulli Work with vendors application teams and other Systems Programming staff to develop core infrastructure technologies and frameworks using best practices that are highly scalable stable and wellperforming lili Collaborates with other IS staff Operations Network Services etc to provide interdisciplinary technical solutions lili Works with project team of users and analysts to develop technical requests ensuring design will integrate with current systems lili Assist staff in coding testing implementing and maintaining systems lili Writes and organizes internal documentation for new and existing applications lili Maintains integrity of applications by routinely running data checks and analyzing errors and imbalances Works to identify causes and prevent further occurrences lili Mentors and supports others in Systems Programming in the design implementation use and support of said applications and core utilities both individually and in teambased mechanisms such as code review and team design sessions lili Develops project technical work plan and enforces adherence lili Participates in teams on call rotation to triage and resolve incoming issues as necessary On call rotation requires 24x7 availability for one week and potentially similar availability during the backup on call week lili Performs all other duties as assigned lili Bachelors degree in Computer Science preferred or relevant clinical IT industry experience lili Five years in application infrastructure programming environment brliulstrong SkillsAbilitiesCompetencies strongstrongem Must be realistic neither overstated nor understated and related to the essential functions of the job bremstrongulli Possess strong interpersonal skills to effectively communicate with cross functional teams including staff at all levels of the organization lili Ability to successfully negotiate and collaborate with others of different skill sets backgrounds an levels within and external to the organization lili Strong problem solving and negotiation skills lili Ability to effectively conduct meetings both formal and informal lili Requires minimal direction from leadership and possesses the ability to learn quickly lili Strong technical skills required including the proven ability to design implement and maintain large complex software libraries lili Ability to translate business need into technical specification and set realistic goals for the completion of said needs lili Stay current on emerging industry technologies and trends Act as a technical leader for entire group Excellent communication ability with other team members is absolutely required lili Able to understand the political climate of the organization and act accordingly lili Ability to work and be flexible within a complex work environment with competing priorities lili Ability to assume a high level of responsibility lili Experience with the management and administration of latest versions of SQL Server SharePoint Team Foundation Server is highly desirable lili Provide require technical support to
